summary:
This mod fixes some bugs and adds some functions for window mode.
All features are independent. You can partly use these you want.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#CCC0A0][size=+4][b]SCRH WindowMode Mod[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center]This mod fixes some bugs and adds some functions for window mode.
All features are independent. You can partly use these you want.[/center]


[heading][color=#CCC0A0][size=+2]Features[/size][/color][/heading]
[b][size=+1]Bugs fixed[/size][/b]

[list]
[*]Double cursor bug
[*]Always on top bug
[/list]

[b][size=+1]Additional functions[/size][/b]

[list]
[*]Auto minimizing Skyrim window when inactive
[*]positioning Skyrim window on the center on starting
[*]Notice with dialog when run Skyrim on fullscreen mode
[*]Pseudo-fullscreen compatible with multi-monitor
[/list]

For details (feature, usage, ...), see readme.


[heading][color=#CCC0A0][size=+2]Requirements[/size][/color][/heading][list]
[*]The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8 +
[*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)[/url] 1.6.16 +
[/list]

[heading][color=#CCC0A0][size=+2]Installation[/size][/color][/heading]
Copy or cut [code][color=#EEDDAA]SKSE[/color][/code] folder and paste to Skyrim [code][color=#EEDDAA]Data[/color][/code] folder.
This mod doesn't work on the real fullscreen mode at all.
Make sure your Skyrim is set to window mode.


[heading][color=#CCC0A0][size=+2]Uninstallation[/size][/color][/heading]
Delete all files you installed. This mod leaves nothing in save files.


[heading][color=#CCC0A0][size=+2]Compatibility[/size][/color][/heading]
This mod is SKSE dll plugin. No conflict with esp mods.
But mods have the same features like below will conflict with this mod.
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36177]Borderless Window[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36125]Double Cursor Fix[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4]Simple Borderless Window[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21277]Skyrim Alt-tab mouse fix[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7347]Skyrim - Unstretched Windowed Fullscreen Mode[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23664]Windowed Mode Relocator[/url]
[/list]

[line]

Have a enjoy.
author: scripthoge

files.name: SCRH WindowMode Mod
files.changelogHtml:
[bugs of mod fixed]
- On multi-monitor environment, if the primary monitor is not at the upper left of monitors,
Skyrim window is positioned incorrectly when MultiMonitor is enabled.

[Feature added]
- Notice with dialog when run on fullscreen mode.
